experiment_name: Abiotic reduction of ketones with silanes catalysed by carbonic anhydrase through an enzymatic zinc hydride
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:20 °C;    reaction_ph:8.0;    reaction_other_conditions:Enzyme loading: 0.05 mol% hCAII (relative to ketone);     Phenylsilane: 3.0 equiv. (relative to ketone);     Reaction time: 3 h;     Shaking: 300 rpm orbital shaker;     Catalyst form: hCAII in whole cells;     Vial: 20 mL scintillation vial, loosely capped.;    reaction_substrate_concentration:25 mM
